resources.string: \nDemocracy Droid is not affiliated with Democracy Now! If you like the application, I encourage you to donate at democracynow.org. This application streams and/or downloads the audio or video episodes of Democracy Now! the War and Peace Report. It is Free and Open Source Software.

Democracy Now! is a national, daily, independent, award-winning news program hosted by journalists Amy Goodman and Juan Gonzalez. Pioneering the largest public media collaboration in the U.S.

Democracy Now! is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-NoDerivs 3.0 United States.

Democracy Droid! provides easy access to the Democracy Now Broadcast, Individual Story, and Blog feed, the Live stream, and Downloads. Long-click on a broadcast to show the options.
Democracy Now! streams live weekdays at 8 am;\n\n
Long Click An Episode to Download, Share, Read Description, and Stream (audio).
Long Click an Episode In order to Download it
Must restart app to take effect
